entry.title: A Note From Mom
entry.summary: Hey Billy! I think this is such a good idea. With your recent firing, you can use this blog to write tutorials and guides, helping people that are just getting started in the IT industry like you were. I’m sure it’ll help a lot of people. Remember not to let it get you down! Stay […]
entry.content:
Hey Billy!  I think this is such a good idea.  With your recent firing, you can use this blog to write tutorials and guides, helping people that are just getting started in the IT industry like you were.  I’m sure it’ll help a lot of people.  

Remember not to let it get you down!  Stay positive, keep doing what you’re doing and something good will come your way.

Oh and don’t forget to hide this post once you get up and running…that would be embarrassing lol!

iloveyou,
Mom

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.summary: This is my first blog post! I just installed this WordPress thing and am eager to get writing and write about so many different topics!
entry.content: This is my first blog post! I just installed this WordPress thing and am eager to get writing and write about so many different topics!
